title: Listener Stories: Vol. 31
description:
Speaking of fractions and astrology... happy August! We've got some wild, wild listener stories this month with a theme straight from Christine's wild west demands: Cowboys! Tune in for everything from ghostly spurs to a comforting cowboy hand during a violent mozzarella stick vomiting incident... and that's why we drink!
Please consider supporting the companies that support us!
Get 50% off your first month of Scentbird when you go to Scentbird.com/DRINK and use code DRINK 
To see what’s going on in your neighborhood, download the free Neighbors app today. Go to ring.com/DRINK to download from the Apple or Android app stores!
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
